Detailed Description

Base class for all chunk encryption / decryption ciphers.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ ChunkCipherAbstract()

IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkCipherAbstract::ChunkCipherAbstract ( ISChunkCryptoCipherBase *  pCipher)
Parameters
pCipherUnmanaged cipher to use for encryption and decryption.

Member Function Documentation

◆ Decrypt() [1/4]

void IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkCipherAbstract::Decrypt ( String^  sCipherText,
array< System::Byte >^ %  mpbArrayPlainTextOut 
)
virtual

Decrypts an input string into an output buffer.

Parameters
[in]sCipherTextThe ciphertext input string.
[out]mpbArrayPlainTextOutThe binary plaintext output buffer.

This function performs chunk decryption using the method implied by the class name (e.g. ChunkCipherV1).

An exception will be thrown if any error occurs. If the exception is specific to the SDK, then the exception will be of type SdkException.
